original_title: NINE DIRTS AND SNOW WHITE FLICKERS
overview: NINE DIRTS AND SNOW WHITE FLICKERS is Onitsuka Chihiro's third live DVD and her first live DVD after signing on with Universal Music Japan. It is a recording of her one-night show on April 26 of the same year at the Bunkamura Orchard Hall. The setlist featured songs from both her Toshiba-EMI and Universal Music era, as well as two covers and one piano solo by HAL-Oh Togashi. For the concert, Onitsuka was backed only by the piano and a quartet.
tagline: Chihiro Onitsuka NINE DIRTS AND SNOW WHITE FLICKERS
title: NINE DIRTS AND SNOW WHITE FLICKERS
